titles.title: United Negro College Fund, Inc. Congressional Gold Medal Act
United Negro College Fund, Inc. Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to award a congressional gold medal to the United Negro College Fund, Inc. and the institutions that make up its membership on the occasion of its 80th year of existence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
United Negro College Fund, Inc. Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill provides for the award of a Congressional Gold Medal to the United Negro College Fund, Inc. and its member institutions in recognition of its 80th anniversary.
